content.question: Write an essay that synthesizes material from at least three of the sources and develops your position on the extent to which schools should support individuality or conformity.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that synthesizes material from at least three of the sources and develops your position on the extent to which schools should support individuality or conformity.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Write introductions and conclusions appropriate to the purpose and context of the rhetorical situation.
